links.title: What 400 Year History Tells Us About Emerging Asset Classes Including Cryptos
links.description: This post is inspired by the presentation by Ashish Kaushal at London Value Investing Club. The content of the post, however, is the view of the author. Humans have always considered some objects as assets. Food, shelter, clothing, water. These have value to people because they're necessary to survive.

messages.body: Tesla: Could Q1 Be Worse? - $TSLA | Seeking Alpha https://seekingalpha.com/article/4146078-tesla-q1-worse

links.title: Tesla: Could Q1 Be Worse?
links.description: It hasn't even been a week since Tesla ( TSLA) reported its Q4 results, but it is time to look forward. We're just a few days away from being halfway through the first quarter of 2018. As the post-earnings reaction for shares was not good, investors are left wondering when the situation will start to improve.
